title: Looking for a Shaughnessy and Violat
author: Laxcat

posts.post_title: Looking for a Shaughnessy and Violat
posts.post_content:
After missing out on the last few auctions I thought I'd try here. I'm not looking for great condition. Looking for nice eye appeal 1 or 2  on both. Paper loss is no big deal to me. Thanks y'all. Piedmont or OM, either one works.

While I'm at it: any ratty Jack Bastian I would also take.
$40 shipped for either of these.  Shoot me a PM if interested.
Got the Smith. Still looking for a Shag and a Violat. Not picky on the Shag even if you have an A without a corner, let me know.

Matt,

Send me your email.
I have a Violat.

Jeff
